basics.name: Edward Uzueta
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa. I expect to graduate in Fall 2027.

education.institution: University of Hawai‘i at Mānoa, Honolulu, HI
James Campbell High School, Ewa Beach, HI

work.summary: Conduct real-time SIGINT collection, analysis, and reporting to support tactical and strategic missions.
highlights: Operated and maintained surveillance and electronic warfare equipment
Performed signal collection and pattern analysis
Produced intelligence reports for command decision-making

work.summary: Fulfilled online orders and provided customer support in a fast-paced retail environment.
highlights: Delivered timely and accurate fulfillment of online orders
Assisted customers with product selection and issue resolution
Supported stock replenishment and curbside pickup operations

volunteer.summary: Led community service and school events through JROTC program.
highlights: Managed snack shack operations during football games
Directed traffic and logistics at events

awards.title: ROTC Cadet of the Month

awards.summary: Recognized for outstanding leadership and performance as an ROTC cadet.
